title: Array Filtering and Summation
brief: Learn how to use the filter() method and reduce() function to solve this problem.

exercise.title: Filtering and Summing
exercise.instructions: Write a JavaScript function that takes an array of numbers and a threshold as arguments, then returns the sum of all elements greater than the threshold.

steps.label: Step 1: Define the problem and parameters
Step 2: Use the filter() method to get elements greater than the threshold
Step 3: Use the reduce() function to sum up the filtered elements
Step 4: Handle edge cases and ensure correct output
Step 5: Test your solution with different inputs
